#summary PTF Tools: GoogleMap shows the PRTG Googlemap on your NOC.
#sidebar PTF_Sidebar

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/GoogleMapLogo.png

= Introduction =

!GoogleMap is a tool to show PRTG's Google Map and Legend on your NOC.

= Details =

The tool comes with an *.ini* file, for you to provide the url to your PRTG server, credentials and other settings.

There are also two *.htm* files included in the download, that need to be copied to the *website* folder of your PRTG installation

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/Googlemap.png

The !GoogleMap tool can be downloaded from [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_VersionHistory this] page.
